description:
Get a grip and drop in. Comfy full-finger mountain biking gloves that are always ready to get down and dirty (DnD). Constructed with Giro’s Super Fit construction, the DND move naturally with your hands. And articulation on the thumb, index, and middle fingers keep you free for shifting, hitting your dropper, and braking.

  • 2mm EVA padding helps dampen vibration and offers some protection from the inevitable bails
  • Stretchy synthetic on the back of the and wicks away moisture and dries quickly
  • AX Suede™ palm is light, durable, breathable, and easy to clean
  • Microfibre on the thumb for wiping away sweat and sniffles
  • Articulation at the joint of the thumb, index, and middle fingers, so you have complete freedom
  • Grippy pads on the thumb, index, and middle fingers stay confidently connected to your controls
  • Touchscreen compatible, so you don’t need to take your gloves off when shooting Friday fails
  • Paneled construction hugs the contours of your hands
  • Stretch panel at the cuff keep your gloves secure and your wrists clear
name: Giro DND Gloves - Unisex
